description:
I can access /servers/1/metadata, but cannot access the same resource using the servers UUID at /servers/UUID/metadata.

This is true for get/put/post and delete on /servers/UUID/metadata/key.
title: OSAPI: Can't access/set/delete server metadata using the servers UUID

comments.content:
I can access /servers/1/metadata, but cannot access the same resource using the servers UUID at /servers/UUID/metadata.

This is true for get/put/post and delete on /servers/UUID/metadata/key.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~throughnothing

comments.content: Looks like I'm not getting this anymore on latest trunk.  I dunno if this was an issue in my vpc (trunk from yesterday), or actually related to some changes that got in recently.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~throughnothing
